item.description: NodeJS # Installation on Linux # git clone https://github.com/nvm-sh/nvm.git /opt/nvm cd /opt/nvm git checkout v0.39.3 Add to ~/.profile: export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm" if [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ]; then . "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" fi if [ -s "$NVM_DIR/bash_completion" ]; then . "$NVM_DIR/bash_completion" fi Install NodeJS: nvm install node nvm install-latest-npm npm install -g yarn Installation on Windows # Install NVM for Windows Settings: root: D:\pgm\nvm path: D:\pgm\nodejs Install NodeJS: nvm list available nvm install latest nvm use newest Install yarn:
